Title: Tad the Lost Explorer and the Secret of King Midas
Writer: Javier López Barreira (story by), Jordi Gasull (screenplay by), Javier López Barreira (screenplay by), Neil Landau (screenplay by), Jordi Gasull, Paco Sáez (development and creative senior)
Actors: Michelle Jenner, Adriana Ugarte, Óscar Barberán, Luis Posada
Plot: Tad Jones, the most awkward explorer, must rescue his beloved Sara from a millionaire who is looking for King Midas' necklace.
